channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @jeremyzilar wow even more impressive. when i guessed correctly i had four letters and i knew the last letter.

If you haven't solved today's Wordle -- this is a spoiler. I was pretty sure I had the answer to today's Wordle, so I did a screen recording of the reveal, to capture the animation, so I could experience it over and over. Now you can too. ğŸ˜€ https://t.co/wC8QMGFIQa
@jeremyzilar wow that's pretty good, you only had three letters. but you knew the last one.
Wordle 281 3/6 ğŸŸ¨â¬œâ¬œâ¬œğŸŸ© ğŸŸ¨â¬œğŸŸ¨â¬œâ¬œ ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©

@Quigs8816 This is a bit different from Iraq. Putin actually has WMDs and has threatened to use them. Yeah it has to be our policy that he goes. Or else there's a new balance of power between the US and Russia.
@Quigs8816 We're just waiting to see what happens in Ukraine before we figure out what the new balance is. But we can't ever "do business" with a Russian leader who threatens to use nukes, unless we're willing to make that threat too.
Putin cannot remain in power.
@lessig I don't get it -- I want Putin gone. I don't see any way out of this mess with him still there. I kind of like that Biden said that.
Any sane person agrees with the president, btw, just sayin, that might enter into your calculations. https://t.co/1dElNRbClF

â€œIâ€™m fine with opinion: conservative opinion, liberal opinion, but when people start to question the truth â€” Who won the 2020 election? Was Jan. 6 an insurrection? â€” I found that unsustainable.â€ https://t.co/pyU41qKAZ7
Computer desk porn. https://t.co/SXF4PvpnTI
@Super_Grover Yeah I meant something else if you think about it a little youâ€™ll figure it out.
How to Talk to People About a Pandemic. https://t.co/Id9gcv0pHj

You can tell I have hard mode turned off by the row of grey below. I was trying to eliminate a bunch of consonants, and as you can see it worked. I don't think there was a way to solve this one in "hard mode." https://t.co/Gj9w2db8aB
@BeaReno The only way it works is if the mayor doesnâ€™t give a shit about what people think which is what Bloombergâ€™s secret was.
@BeaReno Itâ€™s a shitty job.
Just learned about â€œhard modeâ€ in Wordle. I have had it turned off. I think itâ€™s bogus.
New Yorkâ€™s mayor faces a backlash over a vaccine exemption for athletes. (People donâ€™t seem to get the pandemic is not over.) https://t.co/JUNKr9jfBl
Twitter is becoming Yahoo.

@alexwilliams @bketelsen I liked Heroku, and added the app-running functionality to my web server, https://t.co/7tk2vhVTaD. I didn't promote it because I just wanted to use the functionality, not support it.

I imagine Putin watching this and blowing his top. https://t.co/etmNa8Vjoh

Idea for @chrislhayes -- compare the way the repubs in congress work, and the way putin's politics work in russia. help americans see we have a common bond with russians, we both want to remove the insanity from governance. save the planet from nuclear and climate catastrophe.
btw, climate will be a more rational, powerful and unrelenting adversary than putin. we know at some point putin will die. the climate will only learn new tricks to make us miserable. the evacuation of ukraine is a very small rehearsal our future.
